text.div:
BC BreastCancerNCategoryCS CodeSystem

Codes that designate concepts describing breast clinical lymph node categories according to AJCC Cancer Staging Manual 8th Edition.

name: BreastCancerNCategoryCS
title: BC BreastCancerNCategoryCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Codes that designate concepts describing breast clinical lymph node categories according to AJCC Cancer Staging Manual 8th Edition.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol cNX in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol cNX in Version 8 of AJCC's cancer staging manual, breast chapter.
